website_summaries.verdict: One of the few off-road BMX tires that will fit the smaller diameter of less common 16-inch rims.
pros: Smaller tire size fits 16-inch rims that are found on some youth BMX bikes
Has oversize treads for off-road grip and performance
Comes in either black or white for a unique look that will stand out at the bike park
cons: Aggressive treads can run out quickly on pavement

customer_reviews.title: Grandson thinks they are bullet proof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my grandsons bike and we installed them. He thinks they are bullet proof with the word Kevlar. They are well made and have been great. We have alot of stickers and so far I have repaired any tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time with no issues with the packaging. What can I say? It was as described and functions like it should. Seems like good quality. No issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Put a set of these on my daughters bmx bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Put a set of these on my daughters bmx bike. slightly heavier than some of the other tires but seem well made and roll well. kevlar band is a plus and most likely what makes them a little heaver. They fit well on rims made for a 20x1.75 rim.
customer_reviews.author: robert mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and tires look great. Will update with how the tires ware. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: No more flats but wishing for a 1.75 inch tire
customer_reviews.text: I was getting a flat tire every two weeks. In the last two months since I put on this tire on my rear wheel, I've had none. It's sized for 1.75 inch to 2.125 inch wheels. My wheel is 1.75 inch and it was tough squeezing the tire onto the rim. The tire is a bit heavy. This is the best tire I could find, but if somebody would make a skinnier tire, I'd be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Walter O.

customer_reviews.title: Fitment issue
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold it's shape when airing up the inner tube. So in the end I couldn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Owle

customer_reviews.title: Smoot tread for street or trailer.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted smooth treaded tire for a weeride copilot. This worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, look great, nice price, ride nicely says my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my folding Schwinn Loop
customer_reviews.text: My Schwinn Loop came with crappy leaky tires so I replaced them with these and the folding bike rides incredibly smoother. However, I had to remove the mud guards to have these fit, which wasn't a big deal for me. These tires also hold air very well. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a budget upgrade for their bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: ingenuetwo

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike tire
customer_reviews.text: I installed this tire on an electric Trike, with a motor hub on the front wheel. As always, the Bell line of bike tires is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: awesome tires
customer_reviews.text: My son was trilled to pieces to get 2 matching tires. We had been to at least 10 stores to try and get 2 matching tires for his bike and had no success so I know next time we need them where to go.
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great tires.
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to install and look great on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ken-Dave144

product_meta.title: Bell Sports Bell 20-Inch Freestyle Bike Tire
product_meta.description: The Bell Freestyler bike tire features a rugged carbon steel bead and layer of DuPont Kevlar layer to provide extra protection against flats. Tire folds and unfolds without damage.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
